movies.synopsis: A fearless revolutionary leader fights against the British Raj in India, inspiring a nation to rise against colonial rule.
movies.title: RRR

movies.synopsis: A gritty tale of a common man's fight against corruption and injustice in the system, leading to a thrilling climax.

movies.synopsis: A group of elite soldiers embarks on a dangerous mission to stop a global terrorist organization from unleashing chaos.
movies.title: Mission: Impossible - Dead Reckoning Part One

movies.synopsis: In a futuristic world, a young scientist discovers a hidden conspiracy that threatens humanity's survival and must fight to expose the truth.
movies.title: Kalki 2898 AD

movies.synopsis: A heartwarming tale of love and sacrifice, where two individuals from different worlds come together to overcome societal barriers.
movies.title: Rocky Aur Rani Kii Prem Kahaani

movies.synopsis: In a dystopian future, a group of rebels fights against a powerful AI system that controls humanity, risking everything for freedom.
movies.title: The Creator

movies.synopsis: A young man rises from poverty to become a powerful leader, but his journey is fraught with challenges and sacrifices.
movies.title: Pushpa: The Rule

movies.title: Musafa-The Lion King2

movies.synopsis: Many years after the reign of Caesar, a young ape goes on a journey that will lead him to question everything he's been taught about the past and make choices that will define a future for apes and humans alike.
movies.title: Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes

movies.synopsis: The story revolves around a young woman who inherits her family’s chili business and faces fierce competition and family pressure as she strives to modernize and expand the business.
movies.title: Gunturu Karam

movies.synopsis: Tumbbad is a richly imagined and daringly detailed fable of fantasy and horror that, at times, gets overwhelmed by the force of its own world-building.
movies.title: Tumbbad

movies.synopsis: After the events of Stree, the town of Chanderi is being haunted again. This time, women are mysteriously abducted by a terrifying headless entity. Once again, it's up to Vicky and his friends to save their town and loved ones. Bhaskar … MLA … Stree's fear has ended in Chanderi.
movies.title: Stree-2

movies.title: Munjya

movies.synopsis: ‘Hi Nanna’ is a Telugu-language romantic drama film that centers around a doting father and his six-year-old daughter, whose lives change when a woman befriends them, intertwining with their past.

movies.synopsis: A family struggles for survival in the face of a cataclysmic natural disaster.
movies.title: Greenland

movies.synopsis: A covert team of immortal mercenaries are suddenly exposed and must now fight to keep their identity a secret just as an unexpected new member is discovered.
movies.title: The Old Guard

movies.synopsis: 'In the year 2035, survivors of a now almost completely evacuated post-apocalyptic Britain compete for a government bounty to retrieve a mysterious bio weapon known only as Unit Eleven...'

movies.synopsis: After discovering a small, blue, fast hedgehog, a small-town police officer must help him defeat an evil genius who wants to do experiments on him.

movies.synopsis: Twelve strangers wake up in a clearing. They don't know where they are, or how they got there. They don't know they've been chosen - for a very specific purpose - The Hunt.

movies.synopsis: An American action star from the 90's is shooting a movie in Bulgaria, while three of his (now grown up) fans try to meet their childhood idol. After a series of bad decisions, the three ...

movies.synopsis: A group of brave superheroes has to come together to save the multiverse from evil terrorist birds.

movies.synopsis: The groundbreaking and often game-changing reporting of legendary foreign correspondent and author Robert Fisk is profiled in the latest from acclaimed documentarian Yung Chang (Up the Yangtze).

movies.synopsis: Pirates from around the world gather at the Pirates Expo to join the hunt for Gol D. Roger's lost treasure.

movies.title: The Sholay Girl
